comments.body:
{html}

(from [4ca8b4d08073fc20544f6b966212f8caca58941e]) Closes #812 . A visual glitch remains for the table view but the crash is no longer there. Table rows were being orphaned when being replaced, but their parent property wasn't being nilled out. So when images loaded, the _haslisteners would work up the stack, calling on nonexistant sections. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/4ca8b4d08073f...
